mapper.select: SELECT G.GOSU_NO AS "gosu.gosuNo", G.INTRODUCTION AS "gosu.introduction", G.REGION AS "gosu.region", M.USER_PROFILE AS "userProfile", M.USER_NICKNAME AS "userNickname" FROM GOSU G LEFT JOIN ( SELECT USER_NO, USER_PROFILE, USER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER ) M ON M.USER_NO = G.GOSU_NO WHERE G.REGION LIKE #{region} || '%'
